mapper.select: SELECT order_id,buyer_rate FROM tb_order WHERE STATUS =#{status};

SELECT o.receiver_area_name AS ran,o.`order_id` AS oi,o.create_time AS ct,o.payment_time AS pt, o.payment_type AS ptt,o.consign_time AS cct,oi.`title`,oi.`price`,o.`payment`, oi.`total_fee` AS tf,o.`post_fee` AS pf,oi.`pic_path` AS pp,oi.`num`,o.`status` FROM tb_order o LEFT JOIN tb_order_item oi ON o.`order_id`=oi.`order_id` WHERE o.order_id=#{orderId}
